website_summaries.verdict: Great advice for handling the PSAT's various categories and testing style.
pros: Offers a nice mixture of advice on test-taking strategies and study materials for the PSAT
Offers 2 practice tests with clear explanations of the answers
Includes additional math drills for students who need extra help in that area
Tips for better multiple choice question results
cons: May be too large to work through quickly for last-minute test cramming

customer_reviews.title: Two apparent errors in test 2.
customer_reviews.text: We only looked at 3 sections of test 2 so far, but we ran across 2 apparent errors. Question 13 in the no-calculator section doesn't have the correct answer offered. One of the reading passage answers quotes an answer for the question before (the question asks the student to find evidence for the prior question's answer), but the quote in the answer key isn't actually the prior question's answer -- it was one of the options eliminated (support for the prior answer, not the answer itself). Haven't looked at the rest of the book yet, not sure if we will.
customer_reviews.author: StudentReader

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Preparation
customer_reviews.text: I tutor high school Juniors and Seniors every year. Students say the PSAT is user friendly and I agree. Scores are higher and students are enrolled into their favorite colleges and universities!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B. Whittleton

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: You want your young one to do well on the tests - buy this NOW -excellent prep
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good prep for the 10/19 PSAT
customer_reviews.text: They say third try is a charm. Must be so. After being disappointed by the first two books ordered to assist a student I tutor, found this book to be a good source for preparing for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: RJG

customer_reviews.title: This improved our teenager's confidence
customer_reviews.text: Excellent preparation book for my 15 year old. We buy a few different books and encourage him to use library resources too. This particular one and Kaplan will be purchased for our younger son in a couple of years. It contains a lot of practice exercises and tests that are more than enough to prepare your students.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: repeat of prior Editions
customer_reviews.text: I expected to find new practice tests in the 2019 Edition. It was almost entirely the same as the 2017 Edition. Disappointed in the lack of differences between editions, but overall it is worth having only one of the editions of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Package Left at wrong address and exposed to elements in driveway
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the book. Actually seems to be pretty comprehensive and well structured. Apologize as this dissatisfaction is with the shipping company as item was marked as delivered, Only after our neighbor came over stating she found the envelope dropped off somewhere in her driveway.
customer_reviews.author: R VV

customer_reviews.title: Good practice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my junior helped alot we timed her taking each section to help her. Her score increased and was more comfortable taking the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Almarie Rush

customer_reviews.title: Pass the PSAT Please!
customer_reviews.text: As a Tutor I found this book very informative well set up and easy for students to follow. I’ve recommended it to my students and they use it even after PSAT just for the study skills section. It’s is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: EJL

customer_reviews.title: Great guide
customer_reviews.text: Easily understandable sections and workable problems. Would’ve preferred additional online testing .
customer_reviews.author: AnnaRoseH

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for studying
customer_reviews.text: This offers a comprehensive guide to taking the PSAT. I have been very satisfied with it, and it seems like it will help a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: great material to study for the test
customer_reviews.text: Best book to study for the PSAT ! Easy to follow and practice.
customer_reviews.author: ert

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Helps give confidence
customer_reviews.text: Had my son read this and take a practice test before the "real" test. He came out confident that he did well. I am typing this before seeing the results, but usually when a child comes out of test feeling good, it is positive.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Helpful if the student is willing
customer_reviews.text: It sat on my child's shelf who was not motivated to prepare. The content is good.
customer_reviews.author: cshueh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with my own kids. It's very thorough. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Hello, can I return this book ? I bought it last year tho so it’s used but like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cracking the PSAT/NMSQT with 2 Practice Tests, 2019 Edition: The Strategies, Practice, and Review You Need for the Score You Want (College Test Preparation)
